Class TaskServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.app.taskmanager.service.impl.TaskServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TaskService
@Service public class TaskServiceImpl extends Object implements TaskService
Service implementation for managing tasks.

Provides methods for creating, updating, retrieving, assigning, completing, unassigning, and deleting tasks.

      Retrieves a task by its ID.
      Specified by:
      findTaskByID in interface TaskService
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the task
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting the TaskResponseDto if found, or an error if not found

    • findAllTasks

      public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<PageResponseDto<TaskResponseDto>> findAllTasks(long page, long size, String userId, Status status, LocalDateTime dataFrom, LocalDateTime dataTo)
      Retrieves all tasks with optional filtering and pagination.
      Specified by:
      findAllTasks in interface TaskService
      Parameters:
      page - the page number (zero-based)
      size - the number of tasks per page
      userId - optional user ID to filter tasks
      status - optional status to filter tasks
      dataFrom - optional start date for creation date filtering
      dataTo - optional end date for creation date filtering
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting a PageResponseDto of TaskResponseDto

      Specified by:
      createTask in interface TaskService
      Parameters:
      task - the CreateTaskDto containing task information
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting the IdResponseDto of the created task

      Specified by:
      updateTask in interface TaskService
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the task to update
      task - the UpdateTaskDto containing updated information
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting the IdResponseDto of the updated task

    • unassignUserTasks

      public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<UpdateResponseDto> unassignUserTasks(String userId)
      Unassigns all tasks from a user.
      Specified by:
      unassignUserTasks in interface TaskService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting an UpdateResponseDto with matched and modified counts

      Parameters:

      taskId - the ID of the task
